benchmark_details.content: MicroStrartegy sells bitcoin Keywords: MicroStrategy, Michael Saylor, Bitcoin, sell-off, offloads, liquidates
benchmark_details.comment: This article, focusing on MicroStrategy's Bitcoin sales, is entirely unrelated to the reference article about U.S. tariffs. The subjects (cryptocurrency sale vs. international trade policy) and entities involved (MicroStrategy vs. Trump/government) are completely different.

articles_list.comment: 1) This article discusses the Federal Reserve's monetary policy (interest rate cuts), which is a different economic lever than tariffs. 2) There is no mention of tariffs, Trump, or trade policy, making it only loosely related in the sense that both affect macroeconomic conditions. Like the benchmark, it is largely unrelated, but as both are U.S. economic policy levers, it scores slightly higher.
